violations.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

relatedNodes.html:
<button _ngcontent-qlt-c58="" type="submit" class="btn btn-primary" aria-label="Confirmation. <br/>w.e.f 12 January 2026, only Aadhaar-authenticated users are allowed to book general reserved tickets on the opening day of Advance Reservation Period(ARP).

<br/><br/>12 जनवरी 2026 से अग्रिम आरक्षण अवधि (ARP) के आरंभिक दिन सामान्य आरक्षित टिकटों की बुकिंग केवल आधार-प्रमाणित उपयोगकर्ताओं को ही करने की अनुमति है।. Press OK to confirm">

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.66 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #fb792b, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
